html: (Mosiah 14:2)."He shall grow up before him as a tender plant, and as a root out of a dry ground." The Christ child will grow up as any child of tender years, dependent upon the care of others. As a plant or root growing in arid ground, He will need the nurturing of others to survive. In addition to the conditions of the physical ground, the young Seedling who would later declare Himself to be the "root … of David" (Revelation 22:16) will also find Himself being raised in the spiritually dry and barren conditions of an apostate people.
